content: June 22 Carpenter Co  Leggett & Platt Inc   Mohawk Inc and three other makers of polyurethane foam agreed to pay as much as $128.5 million to settle lawsuits accusing them of conspiring to fix prices.
name: Leggett & Platt Incorporated
title: Polyurethane foam makers in $128.5 mln US price-fixing accords
